post.description: Lookup or search product/offers based on various search criteria. This API can be used to drive Browse and PDP pages.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Format "Authorization Bearer <<OAuth Token>>"

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Request message format as application/json or application/xml (default assumed application/json)

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Content-Types that are acceptable including application/json or application/xml (default assumed application/json)

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: API version.

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: Channel identifier. NA is treated as default.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: Consuming Application identifier. NA is treated as default. More values will be added to swagger as clients are onboarded.

parameters.name: interactionId
parameters.description: Alphanumeric value represent a common transaction id across all calls made from UI, while completing all business activity needs of a particular customer.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the retail store location. Mandatory for FullService  (Tmobile RETAIL channel). Need to discuss with T-Mobile business liaison if there is a need for Partner to pass their retail Store Id).

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Body of the request containing key value criteria

post.summary: Get product details for specified product family ID. A Product ID in case of a Hard Goods is Device Family (iPhone 6) or in case of Soft Goods is the Plan (ex. Simple Choice 10 GB)
post.description: Get details for specified Product (all SKUs or default SKU)

parameters.name: productID
parameters.description: Product family ID.

post.description: Lookup for product pricing which can also deliver promotional price if promotion details are provided.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Format "Authorization Bearer <<OAuth Token>>"

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Request message format as application/json or application/xml (default assumed application/json)

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Content-Types that are acceptable including application/json or application/xml (default assumed application/json)

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: API version.

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: Channel identifier. NA is treated as default.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: Consuming Application identifier. NA is treated as default. More values will be added to swagger as clients are onboarded.

parameters.name: interactionId
parameters.description: Alphanumeric value represent a common transaction id across all calls made from UI, while completing all business activity needs of a particular customer.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the retail store location. Mandatory for FullService  (Tmobile RETAIL channel). Need to discuss with T-Mobile business liaison if there is a need for Partner to pass their retail Store Id).

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Body of the request

sku.description: SKU/variant of the offer. If Sku is present, result will contain only one offer and single variant.

productType.description: type of products, comma separated values from enum. If not specified defaults to ALL.

productSubType.description: sub type of products. If not specified defaults to ALL.

customerSegment.description: Customer segment to which the offer is available.

accountSegment.description: Account Segment to which the offers are available.

customerId.description: Customer ID for the existing customers

cartId.description: Cart ID to use as context along with LineID for returning the product offers

lineId.description: Line ID of the cart to use as context for returning the product offers. Cart ID is needed when Line Id is specified.

postalCode.description: Postal code to filter offer availability

storeId.description: Store Id to use filter offer availability

city.description: City to filter for offer availability

state.description: State code to filter for offer availability

offerSubType.description: Offer Sub Type for offer availability

sort.description: Sort type comma separated values. If not specified defaults to relevance.

sortOrder.description: Sort order. If not specified defaults to ascending.

detailed.description: If false -Response will have summary else complete details. Default is false.

condition.description: condition for a hard goods product, comma seperated values e.g. New, Pre-Owned

operatingSystem.description: operating system for a hard goods product. comma seperated values e.g. Andriod, iOS, windows.

features.description: features comma seperated values e.g. 4G, LTE, Wi-Fi Calling.

creditLevel.description: Identifies the credit level, which is a bucket of credit classes. ex. GOOD, BUILDING, NONE

tacCode.description: TAC code for the device SKU.

relationType.description: The relationship type to filter products by. This is applicable only when querying for relationships.

crpId.description: credit risk profile id of the customer in context.

promotiondetails.description: Details of Promotion for which price is needed.

promoName.description: promo Name - mandatory if promotional price is required in response

totalPages.description: Total pages based on per page record count

productCriteriaId.description: The id representing the input offer criteria.

familyId.description: Family Id is same as offer Id for hard goods but may be different for soft goods

displayPriority.description: natrual display order of the products

colorSwatch.description: color swatch when the offer is a hard goods es. device

upcId.description: UPC id assigned by the manufacturer. applicable for hard goods

reviews.description: Number of reviews for the product

averageStarRating.description: Average star rating for the product.

ratingSku.description: SKU Id for the offer in the review/rating system

boxContents.description: Box Contents. This is applicable for Hard Goods only

enabled.description: Used in the context of service selection. Indicates if the service is available or unavailable.

selected.description: Used in the context of service selection. Indicates if the service is currently selected.

serviceConfigurationId.description: Used in the context of Service selection. This is the service bundle id.

categories.description: List of categories the product belongs to

condition.description: Offer condition. ex. Used, CPO etc

defaultColor.description: Default color variant of the offer. Applicable mainly for hard goods

defaultSKU.description: Default SKU of the offer. Applicable for hard goods

isBestSeller.description: Flag indicating if product is best seller

isFeatured.description: Flag indicating if product is Featured

features.description: Collection of product features. Each feature has a name, description and icon URL to drive typical PDP page.

url.description: Relation image path of the icon URL. This is optional.

id.description: Item Id of the product offer

upc.description: SKU Id assigned by the device manufacturer

isDefaultSKU.description: Flag indicating if the item is the default sku

condition.description: Condition of the SKU (for hard goods)

estimatedShippingFromDate.description: Estimated date from which the item may start shipping.

estimatedShippingToDate.description: Estimated date by which the item may be shipped.

reviewCount.description: Count of Reviews of the SKU

reviewStarImagePath.description: Relative Image path for the Star Image used in Reviews/Ratings

availability.description: Represents the availability status of the item ex. In stock or Out of Stock

specifications.description: key value pair data of item specification

price.description: Collection of Price options available for this item. Each Credit Class/Credit Level and Pricing option is a unique entry.

creditLevel.description: Identifies the credit level associated with this pricing option (GOOD/BUILDING/NONE). This is used for anonymous user scenario.

creditClass.description: identifies the credit class for a known customer scenario.

images.description: Map of image type to relative path of image URLs

url.description: Relative path to the image URLs

attributes.description: Key Value pairs of attribute data

groups.description: Collection of groups that the item belongs to. This could be different than the categories.

tacCodes.description: The TAC code is the first 8 digits of the IMEI. Used here to lookup products.

promotion.description: Promotion Offer Details like id, name, description. The price point is factored into the pricing construct for product or cart.

promoType.description: Type of Promo Applied. In this case it is Catalog promotion only.

pricingOption.description: Pricing Option represents the highest level of pricing construct. It summarizes each option by Due Today and Due Monthly price points. The detailed breakup of the pricing optioin is available under price component.

payNowPrice.description: This is the Due Today Price

monthlyPrice.description: This is also known as Due Monthly Price

component.description: Breakdown of the Due Today and Monthly price

priceComponent.description: Price Component builds upon the lowest price construct to describe constituent price points for a pricing option. ex. breakup of EIP Due Today

term.description: # of terms, applicable for installment pricing

listPrice.description: List Price is also commonly known as Regular Price

purchasePrice.description: Purchase Price is also commonly known as Sale Price

promotion.description: Total discount amount due to promotions applied to the item

price.description: This is the smallest building block for pricing structures
